title: I hate this patch
body:
Riot apparently learned nothing from Feral Flare. So now Sated Devourer gets to rape with anyone who has on-hit affects and likes attack speed ({{champion:11}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:10}} ). With the new Rylai's Kayle can AoE 40% slow on a RANGED ability. The same ability is pretty much doing double damage with new Devourer. The best part? It's her auto attacks.

You also literally can't itemize against Yi now. Sated lets him proc his E 8,000 times with true damage, but if you build health BotRK destroys you. Alpha is up every .5 seconds since the on-hit counts for the reset on it.

Elise still got no buffs despite having her sustain nerfed last patch.

But hey, at least Tahm Kench came out, so that's cool.

replies.body: {{champion:11}} is a total nightmare right now, I just hate how cheap he is... basically just Q and AA, rinse and repeat, destroying everyone while still sustaining amazingly with lifesteal and if you fuck him over, he becomes unchaseable with his ult. Gut him pls.
Udyr is good with it but if riot nerfs him I swear. He isnt the problem
0 points for relevance to the original post.
